MESSAGE.value: First commit for project 03 by Trevor Wysong

Second commit. I tried rotating sprites with built in method but the position gets offset around a circle and messed things up. I bruteforced the problem by loading in all directions of sprite and then drawing the corresponding one based on the last key press.

Discarded old walls and created first map in tiled. Manually checked pixels by taking all out of bound rectangles and calculating pixels from origin by counting the tiles. Looks better, and I think it cut down on a lot of code and sprites.

Added a topper to my tank sprite. I am using the tank because it is easy to tell which direction it is moving as well as which direction projectiles are going to go. The tank topper moves with keys 'A' 'S' 'D' 'W'. Tomorrow I will work on projectiles and enemies.
Cleaned update function and created separate functions for different tasks so that they can be called in update in 1 line.
Cleaned update function and created separate functions for different tasks so that they can be called in update in 1 line. Began writing code for projectiles.

Got projectiles working so that they can be shot multiple at a time and each shot stops being drawn if there is a collision with wall. Now I will work on adding a timer to delay shots and fixing the shot offset and direction based on the tank topper direction.
Added appropriate offsets and direction for player projectiles based on tank topper rotation and position.

Started on enemy implementation, gathered necessary images and loaded them in. Organized code to check for level based on score and fixed the game over condition so that things will stop being drawn to the screen and updated when the player runs out of lives.

Added some of the enemy movement for level 1 and some of the enemy collision detection with walls. I need to implement proximity chasing and the rest of collision detection. Also will work on enemy projectiles tomorrow and score.
Fixed a few movement bugs to get ready to add chasing, more enemy collision detection, and shooting if a player is within shot range.
Added player projectile and enemy collision detection and scoring. Will add more enemy movement and projectiles now.
Added player and enemy collision detection.
Added chasing, my brain hurts from keeping track of loops. Will add enemy projectiles now.
Started implementing enemy projectiles, have a lot of work to do on them still
Finished enemy projectile implementation with collision detection. Will work on printing score to screen and adding the other two levels soon.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Finished enemy projectile implementation with collision detection. Will work on printing score to screen and adding the other two levels soon.
